entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 04:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: NNW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
